nodes.text: The Droma sector was part of the Galactic Republic, between Yaga Minor and Glythe sector, in the Mid Rim. It contained the planet Lonnaw, the first stop of Outbound Flight.
Decades later, the Nebulon-B frigate Elite during the Operation Grain Snatch received a shipment of poisoned grain intended for Imperial troops in Droma Sector, which led to the execution of Ghorin.
